text: Pagliero may refer to: *Pagliero, Cuneo, a village in the Province of Cuneo, Italy ==People with the surname== *Leonard Pagliero (1913–2008), British stationer and chairman of The Kennel Club *Ludmila Pagliero (born 1983), Argentine ballet dancer *Marcello Pagliero (1907–1980), Italian film director Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Pagliero
